title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.17 - Headlight display
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.17 - Headlight display

State Regulations

All vehicles shall display lights from one-half hour after
sunset to one-half hour before sunrise, and at all other times when there is
not sufficient light to render clearly discernible persons and vehicles at a
distance of 500 feet, except when such vehicles are parked in areas designated
by the manager. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1152.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
